hero.title: Intelligent Acoustic Auditing for Swine Maternity.
hero.subtitle: Reduce crushing mortality in the first 72 hours. 24/7 monitoring through Edge AI, no cameras, with 100% energy autonomy.

problem.title: A silent problem impacting your profitability
problem.description: Neonatal crushing mortality in swine maternity houses represents up to 8% losses per litter. Late detection of acoustic stress signals — such as crushing screams and persistent coughing — delays intervention and multiplies losses. Traditional camera-based methods compromise biosecurity and require expensive network infrastructure.

solution.title: Technology that listens to what you can't hear

privacy.title: Absolute Privacy
privacy.description: Zero cameras. We only process decibel frequencies through edge acoustic AI models. No images, no video transmission, no risk.

biosecurity.title: IP65 Biosecurity
biosecurity.description: Sealed nodes designed for hostile environments. Withstand pressure washing, disinfection chemicals, and extreme temperatures.

autonomy.title: Total Autonomy
autonomy.description: Integrated industrial batteries with months of autonomy. No cables, no dependency on your power grid, no single points of failure.

extraction.title: Magnetic Extraction
extraction.description: Local data download via magnetic connector. No contact with your Wi-Fi network or IT infrastructure. Data stays secure on your device.

rdVision.title: Brivex R&D: The Future of Biosecurity
rdVision.subtitle: Bio-Alert is our Trojan Horse. Our vision is a comprehensive ecosystem.
rdVision.intro: We are not a single-sensor company. At Brivex, we are developing the next generation of IoT infrastructure to guarantee the sanitary invulnerability of your facilities. By joining our ecosystem today, your farm will be ready for our future R&D implementations:

environmental.title: Environmental & Epidemiological Monitoring
environmental.description: Next-generation sensors for real-time measurement of particulate matter, critical ammonia levels, and early detection of airborne pathogens and waterline contaminants.

biomarkers.title: Advanced Clinical Biomarkers
biomarkers.description: Evolution of our AI algorithms to identify behavioral patterns and anomalies that precede severe outbreaks, such as the neurological alterations typical of streptococcal meningitis.

access.title: Intelligent Access Control & Disinfection
access.description: Automated systems to audit personnel flow. Integration of smart sanitary airlocks that ensure compliance with shower and advanced disinfection protocols.
